name: Insight: Technology
overview: Amiga CDTV/CD32 multimedia CD that explains how things work. Have you ever wondered how things actually worked? From the simple ball-point pen to the mighty space shuttle - Insight: Technology for the AMIGA CD32 will answer your questions. Explore over 300 full-color computer graphic images, ranging from static, exploded diagrams to action-packed animations. In addition, you can browse through an extensive photo library containing over 700 photographs produced as eye-catching and entertaining narrated slideshows. Read about each topic in-depth and see topics spring to life with motion video clips. Insight: Technology has been designed in an easy pick up and read style to be exciting, informative and educational for your family. Why fill a shelf when you can fill your mind?
